public java.lang.Long[] checkPaymentObligationPeriod(PaymentObligationPackDTO dto)
Specified by:
checkPaymentObligationPeriod in interface PaymentObligationService
Returns:
the payment obligation's ids of these that exceed the payment obligation period of the guarantee type associated to the (there is only one) active issuer's certification. the periods' bounds are: inclusive, exclusive

Specified by:
getStatusToFilter in interface PaymentObligationService
Returns:
the status showed in the search payment obligation page allowed to the logged user (e.g. in case of seller group this method restricts the states)
